description.zh: 设备管理 - 连接、选择和控制Android设备
description.en: Device management - Connect, select and control Android devices

description.zh: 模拟器管理 - 启动、停止和管理Android模拟器
description.en: Emulator management - Start, stop and manage Android emulators

description.zh: 输入控制 - 模拟触摸、按键和文本输入
description.en: Input control - Simulate touch, keys and text input

description.zh: 日志查看 - 查看和过滤Android系统日志
description.en: Log viewing - View and filter Android system logs

description.zh: 系统信息 - 导出电池、内存、CPU等系统信息
description.en: System info - Dump battery, memory, CPU and other system information

description.zh: 文件系统 - 设备文件推送、拉取和管理
description.en: File system - Push, pull and manage device files

description.zh: 进程管理 - 查看和管理Android进程
description.en: Process management - View and manage Android processes

description.zh: 显示控制 - 屏幕刷新率和显示相关设置
description.en: Display control - Screen refresh rate and display settings

description.zh: 性能追踪 - 使用Perfetto采集系统性能数据
description.en: Performance tracing - Collect system performance data with Perfetto

description.zh: 界面分析 - Winscope窗口和图层分析工具
description.en: UI analysis - Winscope window and layer analysis tool

description.zh: 动态插桩 - Frida脚本注入和调试
description.en: Dynamic instrumentation - Frida script injection and debugging

description.zh: 系统设置 - SELinux、Hidden API等系统级配置
description.en: System settings - SELinux, Hidden API and system-level configurations

description.zh: 应用管理 - 应用列表、版本查询和数据清理
description.en: App management - List apps, check versions and clear data

description.zh: 编译构建 - Android系统和模块编译
description.en: Build - Android system and module compilation
